title: Technology Acceptance and Learning Outcome Analysis in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Foundational Business Administration Knowledge
context.additional_context: Requires cultural diversity considerations and optimization for smartphone-based learning environments targeting MBA students with international backgrounds

learning_goals: Compare and explain the advantages and disadvantages of blended learning and traditional learning approaches
Learning environment design strategies can be proposed using the Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT).
Metrics can be developed to evaluate the efficiency of smartphone-based learning in constrained technological environments.
Blended instruction strategies can be established for learners with diverse cultural backgrounds.
A report can be written analyzing the correlation between learning outcomes and technology acceptance levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
